description: Zoho Inventory helps businesses track stock, manage orders, and sync inventory across multiple sales channels, streamlining supply chain operations

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_ADD_INVOICE_ATTACHMENT
capabilities.description: Tool to upload an attachment to a specific invoice. Use when you need to add a file attachment to an invoice.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_BULK_DELETE_SALES_ORDERS
capabilities.description: Tool to bulk delete sales orders. Use this to remove multiple sales orders at once.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_BULK_EMAIL_INVOICES
capabilities.description: Tool to send multiple invoices by email in one call. Use when you need to notify customers for up to 10 invoices at once.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_BULK_EXPORT_INVOICES
capabilities.description: Tool to bulk export invoices as a single PDF. Use when you need to download multiple invoices in a single file for archiving or sharing.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_BULK_PRINT_INVOICES
capabilities.description: Tool to bulk print invoices as a consolidated PDF. Use when you need a PDF file of multiple invoices for printing or archiving.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_BULK_PRINT_PACKAGES
capabilities.description: Tool to bulk print package slips as a consolidated PDF. Use when you need a PDF file of multiple package slips for printing or archiving.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_CANCEL_INVOICE_WRITE_OFF
capabilities.description: Tool to cancel write off for an invoice. Use when undoing a previously applied write off on an invoice after verifying the invoice has a write off applied.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_DELETE_COMPOSITE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a composite item. Use when you need to remove an existing composite item. Endpoint: DELETE /inventory/v1/compositeitems/{composite_item_id} Required query: organization_id Authorization header: Zoho-oauthtoken {access_token}

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_DELETE_CONTACT_PERSON
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a contact person. Use when you need to remove a contact person from your organization after confirming it is no longer needed.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_DELETE_INVOICE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete an invoice. Use when you need to remove an existing invoice that has no payments or credits applied.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_DELETE_INVOICE_ATTACHMENT
capabilities.description: Tool to delete an invoice attachment. Use when you need to remove a file attached to an invoice.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_DELETE_INVOICE_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Delete a specific comment from an invoice in Zoho Inventory. Zoho API: DELETE /inventory/v1/invoices/{invoice_id}/comments/{comment_id} Required query param: organization_id Auth header format: Authorization: Zoho-oauthtoken <access_token>

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_DELETE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to delete an item. Use when you need to remove an existing inventory item after confirming it is not referenced in any transactions.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_DELETE_ITEM_GROUP
capabilities.description: Tool to delete an item group. Use to remove an existing item group that is no longer needed.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_DELETE_ITEM_IMAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete an image associated with an item. Use when you need to remove an item's image after ensuring it's no longer required.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_DELETE_PACKAGE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a package. Use when you need to remove an existing package created for a sales order.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_DELETE_SALES_ORDER
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a sales order. Use when you need to remove an existing sales order.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_DISABLE_PAYMENT_REMINDER
capabilities.description: Tool to disable payment reminders for an invoice. Use when you want to stop automatic payment reminders for an invoice after it has been issued.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_EMAIL_INVOICE
capabilities.description: Tool to email a specific invoice to customers. Use when you need to send an invoice via email, with optional attachments.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_INVENTORY_LIST_SALES_ORDERS
capabilities.description: Tool to list sales orders. Use when needing to fetch sales orders for an organization.
